items.question: What's the minimum commitment for Smart tier?
items.answer: Smart tier requires a 6-month minimum commitment. The SmartBox remains Marie Lou property but is free to use during your subscription.

items.question: Can we switch between Flex and Smart?
items.answer: Absolutely! Many companies start with Flex to try our coffee, then upgrade to Smart for the full experience. We'll credit your Flex history.

items.question: How does the SmartBox work?
items.answer: The SmartBox has a built-in weight sensor that tracks coffee levels. When you drop below 20%, we automatically ship more. You just refill the container when packages arrive.

items.question: What if we need more coffee for a special event?
items.answer: Smart customers can place additional orders anytime through the portal. These are billed as extras on your monthly invoice.

items.question: Do you offer both coffee and tea?
items.answer: Yes! Both tiers support Marie Lou Coffee and Marie Lou Tea. For Smart tier, you can have separate SmartBoxes for each.
